ModMetaData.name: GTek's Arsenal 2.0 - Ultimate Survival and Colony Defense
ModMetaData.author: GrahammerTek
ModMetaData.description: Tired of raiders showing up with the same old autopistol? Want a realistic gun mod with a little more "style"? Don't care about so called "Bloat? Then GTek has a supply of used, surplus sporting rifles with your name on it!
